message.body: Sofie! thank you for leaving the painting of me! i love love loe it of course! can't wait to line my future hallways with your artwork :). miss you
Oh man Susanna I wish I could have left you a better one. They got so good But im selling them for school.
this one has so much meaning to me, not because im the subject,. but ebcause of the memories from the night it was created. i wouldnn't trade it :)
Also, i hope i can visit you this year. would be awesome to spend a weekend together!
